tool_description: detects `ip_address` geo location (leave it blank to detect the requester geo location)
name: Geo Location
title: Geo Location

api_list.name: Geo Location API
api_list.description: This API allows you to detect the geolocation of an ip address,  if you are going to use this directly from your JS code (client side) then there's no need to specify the ip_address in your GET request, otherwise, if you want to know the location of a specific IP address just append it in the GET request under `ip_address`
